pageContext.claim: “I am not a fan of that ambassador, just so you understand. From what I understand, and I heard this a long time ago -- she wouldn't put my picture up. She [Marie Yovanovitch] was an Obama appointee, I believe, and she wouldn't put my -- my picture up.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump’s image wasn't available to be hung for several embassies around the world when he was first elected. CBS reported, “A member of Yovanovitch's legal team said the embassy hung photos of Mr. Trump, Vice President Mike Pence and the secretary of state ‘as soon as they arrived from Washington, D.C.’"
